trustfund:
TF026839-PHRD-ARGENTINA: THIRD
            PROVINCIAL REFORM ADJUSTMENT LOAN-CATAMARCA,TF021547-CAPACITY BUILDING ON GENDER IN
            THE LAC REGION,TF035692-ARGENTINA - PROVINCIAL REFORM
            LOANS II AND III,TF035678-ARGENTINA - THIRD PROVINCIAL
            REFORM LOAN

abstracts.cdata!:
The Catamarca Provincial Reform
            Adjustment Loan Project, will help reform, and restructure
            the provincial government, and ensure an efficient, and
            responsive delivery of public services, within fiscally
            sound policies. Catamarca was selected to participate in the
            program, because of its reformist record since 1995, its
            pressing needs to enhance the efficiency, and quality of
            social sector spending, and the strong demonstration effect
            it would have on other provinces, given its weak record on
            social, and economic indicators. The project will support
            fiscal adjustment, including structural reform in the social
            sectors, based on the design of the Second Provincial Reform
            Loan. Within the reform program to be supported, the health
            component has the specific goal of reaching the poor,
            providing basic health coverage to non-insured indigent
            populations. Similarly, the education component seeks to
            redirect spending, towards schools in poor neighborhoods,
            and provide special retention programs, to reduce drop-out
            rates among the poorest children. The single currency loan
            will be disbursed in three tranches, between FY2001-2003.
